product_name: UCO StakeLight Tent Stake - Package of 2
long_description: Activated by a switch and powered by a single AAA battery, these 2 UCO StakeLight tent stakes will create a perimeter of light around your tent, making it easy to find or set up your tent in the dark. Set it to continuous light or strobe mode to mark your tent's location; no more tripping on guylines or stepping on your tent stakes in the dark. Area mode provides 17 lumens and burns for up to 12 hrs. on a single AAA battery. Strobe mode marks your tent location and burns for up to 24 hrs. LED is in a highly water-resistant (IPX6) thermoplastic elastomer housing; LED housing is adjustable on the stake and can be removed for emergency lighting situations. On/off switch is integrated into the lens. UCO StakeLight tent stakes are constructed from durable 6000-series aluminum.
short_description: Activated by a switch and powered by a single AAA battery, these 2 UCO StakeLight tent stakes will create a perimeter of light around your tent, making it easy to find or set up your tent in the dark.
